attributes.action: Vehicles to slow down and move over for all vehicles stopped at side of the road
attributes.additional_details: Make the roads safer for emergency services, breakdown/recovery services, maintenance workers and general road users
attributes.background: Motorists to slow down & move over for all vehicles stopped at side of the road which have flashing red, blue or yellow lights. Drivers must reduce speed approaching a stationary vehicle on/beside a road & has its lights flashing. 2+ lanes going in the same direction drivers must move over 1 lane

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions when the request is something that's already happening or something that has been announced since you started your petition.

We think your petition is covered by Government or Parliament action already. The highway code includes rules setting out that people should slow down or move into another lane if there are flashing lights being displayed.

If you'd like something else, you could start a new petition clearly explaining what it is.
